messages.subject: New local OK/TX yahoo group (x-post)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone I wanted to spread the word about a new local yahoo group looking for like-minded members.  We are active with weekly park days and some field
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone I wanted to spread the word about a new local yahoo group
looking for like-minded members. We are active with weekly park days and
some field trips. read description below (from 'Home page') to see if this
would be a fit for you. feel free to pass on to other groups as well.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/the_earth_circle/

Description


The Earth Circle Homeskooling Group is a secular group

by nature, but celebrate in the wonder of Mother Earth.



For women to come together to support women who are

thinkers, problem solvers, life guiders, love givers,

and peace makers.



This group is for women of

Oklahoma

and

Texas

to share their thoughts and get support on

parenting: Child-bearing/raising, and home education.

As well as, issues like natural child birthing, VBACs and

HBACs after one or more c-sections, and parental education,

so that the parents are the chooser of their family's

path, not doctors, state, or public school board,

well-intentioned family or friends.



ECHG is also about promoting a healthy life style

through a balance of daily living, natural health care.

recycling - reusing - reducing



Ultimately this is an open forum of discussion. For women supporting women.

I ask that this be a women's only group.

We are here to listen and to learn from one another. We are not afraid to be
questioned, or deemed different.

We are radicals!!



In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11)
Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)

<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
